segments.text: Hi , Jack . Long time no see !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . At least I am still alive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just alive ? I guess you are some lucky guy . I heard you are going out with Jane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you get that idea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , come on . Jane is a very nice girl , someone you meet only once till lifetime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right . I am not boasting , but she is really as beautiful as she is intelligent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I really envy you for finding such a nice girl .
segments.speaker: S2
